00025 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00026 /// CTreeNodeQuickEditor
00027 ///
00028 /// @description  This class is used to quickly edit nodes by merely hovering
00029 ///               over them and typing letters or numbers to edit the node's
00030 ///               name or value, respectively.

00032 /// @limitations  None
00033 ///

00037     Q_OBJECT

00049 
00050 public slots:
00051     void stop( bool on = true );

00056

00058

00062     //This variable stores a pointer to the node currently being edited.  It
